abstract: An option that indicates that 2D body detection is enabled.
overview:
## Discussion

When you set this option in your configuration’s [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARConfiguration/frameSemantics-swift.property] property, ARKit describes the joint positions of a body it detects in the camera image, using normalized coordinates. See [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFrame/detectedBody] for more information.

# bodyDetection

**Type Property**

An option that indicates that 2D body detection is enabled.

## Declaration

```swift
static var bodyDetection: ARConfiguration.FrameSemantics { get }
```

## Discussion

When you set this option in your configuration’s [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARConfiguration/frameSemantics-swift.property] property, ARKit describes the joint positions of a body it detects in the camera image, using normalized coordinates. See [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFrame/detectedBody] for more information.
title: bodyDetection
